Question 3
  Found [requirement] with compatible type.
  Failure: [requirement] is incorrect.
    When applied to the following argument:
    
     | Cat (Infinite, Empty, Empty)
    it produces the following invalid result:
    [Finite 0] A valid result is:
    
     | Infinite
